author: Angad Singh, Kira Dane, David Caprara, Anne Torpey
title: How Coronavirus Caught Up With Japan
description: Cherry blossom season usually marks new beginnings. Not this year.
content: NARA PREFECTURE, Japan Only a month ago, Japan was still holding onto hopes of hosting the Olympics, as it had managed to keep coronaviruses cases unusually low. But as cases started to spike, Prime Minister Shinzo Abe pinned the blame on foreigners and banne… [+2080 chars]
